introbanner.label: Reliable sourcing made easy
introbanner.text: We aim to be the ideal end-to-end digital partner: from harvest and packing, to shipping and delivery, for a seamless full-service experience.

why_choose_wikifarmer.label: Solutions to your biggest challenges
why_choose_wikifarmer.text: We address the most critical pain points in agricultural supply chains with targeted solutions

items.label: Price volatility concerns
items.text: Stop worrying about unpredictable pricing. Our continuous partnership with our large network of suppliers gives us a cutting edge on prices and product availability, driven by quality and market conditions - not by high margins.

items.label: Cash flow constraints
items.text: Break free from cash flow limitations. The food market is dynamic and challenging - this is why we are financing your purchases, helping you secure your stock today and pay 30 days later.

items.label: Complex logistics management
items.text: Simplify your supply chain operations completely. We work with an extensive network of transportation and logistics partners to deliver excellence, reliability and minimized costs, maximizing your profitability and productivity.

items.label: Quality uncertainty issues
items.text: Eliminate quality headaches completely. Our platform and Quality Assurance team will ensure the quality of your order and will resolve your claims, if any, so you can focus on growing your business.

items.name: Lucia
items.company: Purchasing Director at Potato Chips Food Production Unit
items.text: "Wikifarmer has revolutionized our agricultural produce supply chain. Their user-friendly platform and dedicated team have significantly enhanced our efficiency and competitiveness."

items.name: Felix
items.text: "The platform ensures our product requirements and manages logistics smoothly. What distinguishes Wikifarmer from others is their consistent ability to find the best market prices, resulting in significant cost savings."

items.name: Kostas
items.text: "I have been able to sell my stock online, but I have also been able to connect with a vast network of B2B buyers. This has significantly expanded my reach, allowing me to export more and sell more."

sell_buy_on_wikifarmer.label: Your go-to online destination for agricultural products connecting  thousands of Suppliers with large Buyers

sellers.label: SUPPLIERS
sellers.title: Sell on Wikifarmer
text_items: Find business buyers from all across the globe for Olive Oil in Wholesale Prices and more categories
Stop worrying about your cash flow. Get paid instantly, with safety and trust
Avoid large commissions and time-consuming processes
Expand your sales network, with a free additional distribution channel

buyers.label: BUYERS
buyers.title: Source on Wikifarmer
text_items: Source affordable quality products and secure your stock
Enjoy our 360 solutions, including logistics and transportation
Buy smarter and save time by negotiating with multiple suppliers
Ensure transparency and security of transactions

company_vision.label: A fair and transparent digital ecosystem
company_vision.text: Our vision is to create a fair, transparent, and rewarding environment for all people involved in Agriculture: bridging the gap between growers and buyers, avoiding unnecessary large commissions, and forcing transparency, accountability, security, and reliability to every transaction.

get_started.label: Ready to start sourcing more efficiently?
get_started.text: Enjoy all the benefits our digital platform can provide you with, for easier and smarter sourcing of agricultural products
